com.mygdx.game.view

Class HealthBarView

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.view.StatusElementsView
      • com.mygdx.game.view.HealthBarView

  • public class HealthBarView
extends StatusElementsView
    HealthBarView is a class that deals with the view of the health points of the hero.
